Title: Establishes the universal basic income for transition-age youth pilot program
Summary: Establishes the universal basic income for transition-age youth pilot program to provide regular monthly payments to state residents who age out of foster care.
LawCode: Add ยง398-f, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to establishing the universal basic income for transition-age youth pilot program; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
